df-gim
blocks.content: An isomorphism of groups is a homomorphism which is also a bijection, i.e. it preserves equality as well as the group operation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: df-gic
blocks.content: Two groups are said to be isomorphic iff they are connected by at least one isomorphism. Isomorphic groups share all global group properties, but to relate local properties requires knowledge of a specific isomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: gimfn
blocks.content: The group isomorphism function is a well-defined function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gimfn() {
  |- wfn(cgim, cxp(cgrp, cgrp))
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, cgim, cgrp, cgrp, crab(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), wf1o(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)))))
  df-gim(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rabex(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), wf1o(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))
  ovex(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)))
}

  ‚ä¢ GrpIso[Fn](Grp √ó Grp)

  df-gim(hs0, hs1, hs2)

blocks.name: isgim
blocks.content: An isomorphism of groups is a bijective homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isgim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), w3a(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))))
  df-3an(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4))))
  elovmpt2(hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cgim, c2, cgrp, cgrp, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)), crab(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cghm, cv(hs2)), wf1o(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)))))
  df-gim(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  rabex(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cghm, cv(hs2)), wf1o(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))))
  ovex(cv(hs1), cghm, cv(hs2))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cghm, cv(hs2)), co(c1, cghm, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)), wf1o(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4))
  oveq12(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2), c2, cghm)
  syl2an(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2), wb(wf1o(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs2))), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)), wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c3), wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c3, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cbs)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), c4, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c2, cbs)
  f1oeq23(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c3, cfv(cbs, cv(hs2)), c4, cv(hs0))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))))
  pm4.71ri(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)))
  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  ghmgrp2(c0, c1, c2)
  anbi2i(wa(wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp)), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)))
  elrab(hs0, c0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  f1oeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, c4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs2.c(crab(hs0, co(c1, cghm, c2), wf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c4)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(hs1), cghm, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cghm, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isgim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), (c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)}), ((c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp)‚àß c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)}))
  df-3an(c1 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)})
  elovmpt2(hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cgim, c2, cgrp, cgrp, { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)}, { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[GrpHom]hs2)|(hs0 :(Base ` hs1)‚Üî(Base ` hs2))})
  df-gim(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  rabex(hs0, (hs1[GrpHom]hs2), (hs0 :(Base ` hs1)‚Üî(Base ` hs2)))
  ovex(hs1, cghm, hs2)
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (hs1[GrpHom]hs2), (c1[GrpHom]c2), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c2), (hs0 :(Base ` hs1)‚Üî(Base ` hs2)), (hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))
  oveq12(hs1, c1, hs2, c2, cghm)
  syl2an(hs1 = c1, hs2 = c2, ((hs0 :(Base ` hs1)‚Üî(Base ` hs2))‚Üî(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), (Base ` hs1)= c3, (Base ` hs2)= c4)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs1), c3, (Base ` c1), hs1 = c1)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cbs)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs2), c4, (Base ` c2), hs2 = c2)
  fveq2(hs2, c2, cbs)
  f1oeq23((Base ` hs1), c3, (Base ` hs2), c4, hs0)
  bitr4i((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), ((c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp)‚àß c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)}), ((c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp)‚àß(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))))
  pm4.71ri((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)), (c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4), (c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp))
  jca(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c1 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà Grp)
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  ghmgrp2(c0, c1, c2)
  anbi2i((c1 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c2 ‚àà Grp), c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)}, (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)))
  elrab(hs0, c0, (c1[GrpHom]c2), (hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))
  f1oeq1(hs0, c0, c3, c4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)})
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)|(hs0 : c3 ‚Üî c4)})
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((hs1[GrpHom]hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((c1[GrpHom]c2))
  diff.hs0.w((hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))
}

blocks.name: gimf1o
blocks.content: An isomorphism of groups is a bijection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)

blocks.name: gimghm
blocks.content: An isomorphism of groups is a homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)

blocks.name: isgim2
blocks.content: A group isomorphism is a homomorphism whose converse is also a homomorphism. Characterization of isomorphisms similar to ~ ishmeo . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)

blocks.name: subggim
blocks.content: Behavior of subgroups under isomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subggim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  ghmima(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd(c3, cfv(csubg, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c3)), c3))
  sylan(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c3)), c3), wf1(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wf1(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)), wf1o(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  gimf1o(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  f1of1(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  f1imacnv(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2), c3)
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cima(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wss(c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  gimghm(c0, c1, c2)
  ghmpreima(c0, c1, c2, cima(c0, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm subggim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1)‚Üî(c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
} = {
  impbida((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), (c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2))
  sylan((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4), c3 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), (c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  ghmima(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeltrrd(c3, (SubGrp ` c1), (`' c0 "(c0 " c3)), ((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4)‚àß(c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2)))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4), (c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), (`' c0 "(c0 " c3))= c3)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), c3 ‚äÜ c4, (`' c0 "(c0 " c3))= c3, (c0 : c4 ‚Ü£(Base ` c2)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), (c0 : c4 ‚Ü£(Base ` c2)), (c0 : c4 ‚Üî(Base ` c2)))
  gimf1o(c0, c1, c2, c4, (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  f1of1(c0, c4, (Base ` c2))
  f1imacnv(c0, c4, (Base ` c2), c3)
  sylan((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c4), (c0 " c3)‚àà(SubGrp ` c2), (`' c0 "(c0 " c3))‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), c3 ‚äÜ c4, c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  gimghm(c0, c1, c2)
  ghmpreima(c0, c1, c2, (c0 " c3))
}

blocks.name: gimcnv
blocks.content: The converse of a bijective group homomorphism is a bijective group homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gimcnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cgim, c1)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cgim, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1))), wa(wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wcel(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), co(c1, cghm, c2))))
  anim1ci(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wcel(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  eqeltrd(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), co(c1, cghm, c2), c0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  sylib(wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  frel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  dfrel2(c0)
  id(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  isgim2(c0, c1, c2)
  isgim2(ccnv(c0), c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gimcnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2)‚Üí `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpIso]c1))
} = {
  3imtr4i(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpIso]c1), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1)), (`' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1)‚àß `' `' c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)))
  anim1ci(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1), `' `' c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  eqeltrd(`' `' c0, (c1[GrpHom]c2), c0, c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), `' `' c0 = c0, (c0 :(Base ` c1)‚Üí(Base ` c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  sylib((c0 :(Base ` c1)‚Üí(Base ` c2)), `' `' c0 = c0, Rel(c0))
  frel(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  dfrel2(c0)
  id(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  isgim2(c0, c1, c2)
  isgim2(`' c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: gimco
blocks.content: The composition of group isomorphisms is a group isomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm gimco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c4, cgim, c1))), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c4, cgim, c2)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c4, cgim, c1))), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c4, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(c4, cghm, c2)), wcel(ccnv(ccom(c0, c3)), co(c2, cghm, c4))))

  df-gic()
  sseqtri(cima(ccnv(cgim), cdif(universe, c1o)), cxp(cgrp, cgrp), cdm(cgim))
  cnvimass(cgim, cdif(universe, c1o))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cgim), cxp(cgrp, cgrp)), wfn(cgim, cxp(cgrp, cgrp)))
  gimfn()
  fndm(cgim, cxp(cgrp, cgrp))
  relxp(cgrp, cgrp)
  relss(cgic, cxp(cgrp, cgrp))
  gicsym(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  gictr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  impbii(wcel(cv(hs0), cgrp), wbr(cv(hs0), cgic, cv(hs0)))
  gicref(cv(hs0))
  giclcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cgic)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs1.c(cgic)
  diff.hs2.c(cgic)
}

blocks.name: gicen
blocks.content: Isomorphic groups have equinumerous base sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)

thm gicen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3))

} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cgic, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wne(co(c0, cgim, c1), emptycls))
  brgic(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, cgim, c1), emptycls), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgim, c1))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, cgim, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgim, c1)), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cgim, c1)), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  gimf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3)
  f1oen(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cgim, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c2, cen, c3))
}

  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1), c2[‚âÖ]c3)

  fvexd(csubg, c1, hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1))

  imaex(hs0, hs1)

  sylan(hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1), hs1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), (hs0 " hs1)‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1))
  ghmima(hs0, c0, c1, hs1)
  eqcomd(hs1, (`' hs0 "(hs0 " hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)))

  syl(hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1), (hs0 :(Base ` c0)‚Ü£(Base ` c1)), (hs0 :(Base ` c0)‚Üî(Base ` c1)))
  f1of1(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))

  f1imacnv(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), hs1)
  anbi12d(hs2 =(hs0 " hs1), hs2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), hs1 =(`' hs0 " hs2), (hs0 " hs1)‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), hs1 =(`' hs0 "(hs0 " hs1)))
  eleq1(hs2, (hs0 " hs1), (SubGrp ` c1))
  eqeq2d(hs1, (`' hs0 " hs2), (`' hs0 "(hs0 " hs1)), hs2 =(hs0 " hs1))
  imaeq2(hs2, (hs0 " hs1), `' hs0)
  impr(hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpIso]c1), hs2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), hs1 =(`' hs0 " hs2), (hs1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0)‚àß hs2 =(hs0 " hs1)))

  anbi12d(hs1 =(`' hs0 " hs2), hs1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), hs2 =(hs0 " hs1), (`' hs0 " hs2)‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), hs2 =(hs0 "(`' hs0 " hs2)))
  eleq1(hs1, (`' hs0 " hs2), (SubGrp ` c0))
  eqeq2d(hs2, (hs0 " hs1), (hs0 "(`' hs0 " hs2)), hs1 =(`' hs0 " hs2))
  imaeq2(hs1, (`' hs0 " hs2), hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[GrpIso]c1))

  diff.hs1.c((`' hs0 " hs2))
  diff.hs2.c((SubGrp ` c0))
